headline: Why Enphase (ENPH) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of home energy technology company Enphase (NASDAQ:ENPH) jumped 3.5% in the morning session after Jefferies upgraded the stock to Hold from Underperform and raised its price target to $36 from $28.

headline: ENPH or SEDG: Which Stock Shines Brighter in the Solar Energy Market?
summary: Enphase Energy and SolarEdge showcase growth, new products and challenges as investors weigh opportunities in the solar energy market.
